## cfdns public-ipv4

Print the public outgoing IPv4 address

### Synopsis

Fetches (through network) the public and outgoing IPv4 address of the machine

```
cfdns public-ipv4 [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for public-ipv4
```
